title: List users
description: Retrieve a list of users with optional filtering and pagination

tabs.title: javascript
python
tabs.code:
import requests

url = "https://api.example.com/v1/users"

response = requests.get(url)

print(response.text)

tabs.title: go
tabs.code:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://api.example.com/v1/users"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

properties.name: isActive
properties.description: Whether the user account is active

properties.name: updatedAt
properties.description: When the user was last updated
